decision_conditions: SCHEDULE 1: CONDITIONS IMPOSED BY THE REGULATIONS
a. The consent shall expire after a period of five (5) years from the date of this notice.
b. Any advertisements displayed and any site used for the displays of advertisement shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
c. Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.
d. Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
e. No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.

f. No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure or hinder the ready interpretation of any of traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, waterway (including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 7004 Rev 03 Existing Unit 57 No Build Zone Plan; 9000 Rev 01 Existing Site Location Plan; 9102 Rev 02 Existing Ground Floor Plan Unit 57 Plan; PL-000 Rev 1 Site Location Plan; PL-001 Rev 1 Site Plan; PL-101 Rev 1 Proposed Ground Floor Plan; Photo 1 of an Amazon A-Frame Sign.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Installation of one moveable, non-illuminated A-frame sign to front of 57 The Broadway (Advertisement Consent).
